name: Chain Doodle
description:
Do you also love doodling? We do! And let's make it even more fun by adding some gameplay to it!

Create a chain reaction using the pieces provided.

Made in 2 days for the Retroverse Jam #1 by Jael137 with music by SleepyUFO.

Controls

Use the mouse to place. move and remove objects.
